title: Watch, IPL 2023: MS Dhoni shows off lightning-fast reflexes to stump Shubman Gill
content:
Lightning fast MSD! ⚡️ ⚡️How about that for a glovework 👌 👌Big breakthrough for @ChennaiIPL as @imjadeja strikes! 👍 👍#GT lose Shubman Gill. Follow the match ▶️ https://t.co/WsYLvLrRhp #TATAIPL | #Final | #CSKvGT | @msdhoni pic.twitter.com/iaaPHQFNsy— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 29, 2023
